body.raw:
{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"BASE16","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","hmacSignatureFlag":true,"secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"(SKIN HMAC)Verification Signature_export_export","secret":"${vars.skinHmacKey}","source":"<#assign paramNames = [] />
<#assign paramValues = [] />
<#if input.authResult??><#assign paramNames = paramNames + ['authResult']    paramValues = paramValues + [input.authResult]/></#if>
<#if input.merchantReference??><#assign paramNames = paramNames + ['merchantReference']  paramValues = paramValues + [input.merchantReference]/></#if>
<#if input.paymentMethod??><#assign paramNames = paramNames + ['paymentMethod']  paramValues = paramValues + [input.paymentMethod]/></#if>
<#if input.pspReference??><#assign paramNames = paramNames + ['pspReference']    paramValues = paramValues + [input.pspReference]/></#if>
<#if input.shopperLocale??><#assign paramNames = paramNames + ['shopperLocale']  paramValues = paramValues + [input.shopperLocale]/></#if>
<#if input.skinCode??><#assign paramNames = paramNames + ['skinCode']  paramValues = paramValues + [input.skinCode]/></#if>
<#list paramNames as name>${name}:</#list><#list paramValues as value>${value}<#if value_index != paramValues?size-1>:</#if></#list>","id":195,"algorithm":"HmacSHA256","target":"${input.merchantSig}"}

{"charset":"UTF-8","secretBaseEncoding":"BASE16","baseEncoding":"BASE64","method":"HMAC_OUTBOUND_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","hmacSignatureFlag":true,"secretType":"SCRIPT","name":"(SKIN HMAC)Payment Form Signature_export_export","secret":"${vars.skinHmacKey}","source":"<#assign sessionValidityReplaced = auth.hmac.hmacFields.sessionValidity?replace(':', '\\\\:')>allowedMethods:currencyCode:merchantAccount:merchantReference:paymentAmount:recurringContract:resURL:sessionValidity:shopperEmail:shopperLocale:shopperReference:skinCode:card<#list input.supportedAPMs as apm>,${apm.code}<\/#list>:${input.currency}:${vars.merchantCode}:${input.referenceId}:${input.amountInExponent}:ONECLICK,RECURRING:${auth.hmac.hmacFields.resURLReplaced}:${sessionValidityReplaced}:${input.emailAddress}:${input.languageCode}_${input.countryCode}:${input.orderId}:${vars.skinCode}","id":197,"hmacFields":{"resURLReplaced":"<#assign resURLReplaced=input.resultURL?replace(':', '\\\\:')>${resURLReplaced}","sessionValidity":"<#assign sessionValidity = (.now?long + 3600*1000)?number_to_datetime?iso('UTC') >${sessionValidity}"},"algorithm":"HmacSHA256"}
